My name is Kengo Kuma; I am an architect based in Tokyo.
I'm always trying to use natural materials as possibly as I can...
...as I want to bring nature back to architectural design.
I also want to reconnect history and the contemporary city.
In the 20th century, history and the contemporary city have very much separated...
...and no connection exists between history and our life,...
...and through designing architecture, it is possible to reconnect history.
